oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card with images of Union generals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured are four U. S. Civil War generals: Gen. Ulysses S. Grant, Gen. William T. Sherman, Gen. James B. McPherson and Gen. George H. Thomas. The reverse side has a U. S. Internal Revenue 2-cent stamp with an image of George Washington. The Internal; Revenue Act of 1864 taxed photographic images to raise additional funding for the Civil War.
